scripts.test:infra: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml ps | grep -q 'healthy' && docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.preinfra:up:
docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo '
Error: Docker is not running. Please start Docker Desktop and try again.
' && exit 1)
scripts.predb:up:
docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo '
Error: Docker is not running. Please start Docker Desktop and try again.
' && exit 1)
scripts.db:shell:
docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml exec postgres psql -U haven -d haven_dev || (echo '
Error: Database not running. Start with: pnpm db:up
' && exit 1)
